CustomField.description:
This is used to determine the action that needs to be taken for a certain tile.
No Action, clicking on the tile has no effect on the user's experience -If you want to use links within the HTML use this option to have multiple links within the tile.
Open Link, if a link is provided a link will be open for the user.
Open Chat, open a chat if available. (You must provided the class of the button to be pressed for this option to work
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is used to determine the action that needs to be taken for a certain tile.
CustomField.label: Action
